sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本課題來源於大連海事大學的鍋爐房改建工程。

sentences.english: The water feed whole-course control system used in China-bult 300MW unit is described.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了國產300MW機組的鍋爐給水全程控制系統。

sentences.english: The proposition in this paper is also suitable for once-through boiler.
sentences.chinese: 本文所討論的內容也適用於直流鍋爐。

sentences.english: The new Enel plant here opens its first boiler in two months.
sentences.chinese: 二個月後，埃奈爾電廠的第一個新鍋爐將會啓用。

sentences.english: I then soldered up the top and bottom of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 當時我焊接起來的頂部和底部鍋爐。

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: Then proceed to the boiler, deal with the trap, and obtain another dull gray key.
sentences.chinese: 隨後走到鍋爐處，解除陷阱，取得另一枚塵灰色鑰匙。

sentences.english: The vapor boiler is the main equipment consume energy.
sentences.chinese: 熱採注汽鍋爐是稠油開採中的主要耗能設備。

sentences.english: The industry boiler is the important power equipment in the production process.
sentences.chinese: 工業鍋爐是生產過程中的重要動力設備。

sentences.english: The thesis introduced a set of computer distributed control system of fuel boiler in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 論文介紹一種工業燃油鍋爐計算機集散控制系統。

sentences.english: Another was a college man , but he began in the boiler room .
sentences.chinese: 另一種是高校的男子，但他開始在鍋爐房。

sentences.english: Finite element analysis is adopted to calculate secondary quench exchanger tube sheet of ethylene plant.
sentences.chinese: 對乙烯裝置第二急冷鍋爐的管板進行了有限元分析。

sentences.english: The paper describes the process characteristic of pure seawater flue gas desulphurization(SWFGD)developed by Dongfang Boiler Group Co.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了東方鍋爐自主開發的純海水煙氣脫硫工藝特點。

sentences.english: Mark also has the boilers all cut out.
sentences.chinese: 馬克也有鍋爐全部剪下。

sentences.english: It's your job to see that the boilers are stoked up at night.
sentences.chinese: 你的任務就是在夜間給鍋爐加燃料。

sentences.english: Lucun boiler can keep profits from burning up.
